name: GetInterviewDetails
description:
Retrieve detailed information about a specific interview.

This tool is used to fetch interview details using a specific interview ID from the Ashby service. It requires the `interviewsRead` permission.

parameters.name: interview_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the interview to retrieve details for. This is a required field in the request body.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
